title: Ingredients:
text:
• 
1 whole wheat tortilla • 
1 cup cooked chicken breast, sliced • 
1 cup romaine lettuce, chopped • 
2 tablespoons Caesar dressing • 
2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese • 
Optional: croutons for extra crunch

title: Instructions:
text:
• 
Lay the tortilla flat and spread the Caesar dressing evenly. • 
Add the chicken, lettuce, and Parmesan cheese. • 
Roll up the tortilla tightly and slice in half.

title: Ingredients:
text:
• 
1 cup cooked quinoa • 
1/2 cup cherry tomatoes, halved • 
1/2 cucumber, diced • 
1/4 cup red onion, finely chopped • 
1/4 cup feta cheese, crumbled • 
2 tablespoons olive oil • 
1 tablespoon lemon juice • 
Salt and pepper to taste

title: Instructions:
text:
• 
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice. • 
Season with salt and pepper, then toss to combine.

title: Ingredients:
text:
• 
2 slices whole grain bread • 
4 slices turkey breast • 
1/2 avocado, sliced • 
1/2 cup spinach leaves • 
1 tablespoon mustard or mayo

title: Instructions:
text:
• 
Spread mustard or mayo on one slice of bread. • 
Layer the turkey, avocado, and spinach on top. • 
Top with the second slice of bread and cut in half.

title: Ingredients:
text:
• 
1 cup Greek yogurt • 
1/2 cup granola • 
1/2 cup mixed berries (strawberries, blueberries, raspberries) • 
1 tablespoon honey

title: Instructions:
text:
• 
In a bowl or jar, layer the Greek yogurt, granola, and mixed berries. • 
Drizzle with honey. • 
Repeat the layers if desired.

title: Ingredients:
text:
• 
1 whole wheat pita bread • 
1/2 cup hummus • 
1/2 cup cucumber, sliced • 
1/2 cup bell pepper, sliced • 
1/4 cup shredded carrots • 
1/4 cup baby spinach

title: Instructions:
text:
• 
Cut the pita bread in half to create pockets. • 
Spread hummus inside each pocket. • 
Fill with cucumber, bell pepper, carrots, and spinach.

title: Ingredients:
text:
• 
1 can tuna, drained • 
1/4 cup mayonnaise • 
1 tablespoon Dijon mustard • 
1 celery stalk, diced • 
1/4 cup red onion, finely chopped • 
Salt and pepper to taste • 
Lettuce leaves or whole grain bread for serving

title: Instructions:
text:
• 
In a bowl, combine the tuna, mayonnaise, Dijon mustard, celery, and red onion. • 
Season with salt and pepper. • 
Serve on lettuce leaves or whole grain bread.

title: Ingredients:
text:
• 
2 slices ciabatta bread • 
1/2 cup fresh mozzarella, sliced • 
1 tomato, sliced • 
Fresh basil leaves • 
1 tablespoon balsamic glaze • 
1 tablespoon olive oil • 
Salt and pepper to taste

title: Instructions:
text:
• 
Drizzle olive oil on one slice of bread. • 
Layer the mozzarella, tomato, and basil on top. • 
Drizzle with balsamic glaze and season with salt and pepper. • 
Top with the second slice of bread and cut in half.

title: Ingredients:
text:
• 
1 cup cooked chicken breast, shredded • 
1/4 cup mayonnaise • 
1 tablespoon Dijon mustard • 
1 celery stalk, diced • 
1/4 cup red grapes, halved • 
Salt and pepper to taste • 
Lettuce leaves for serving

title: Instructions:
text:
• 
In a bowl, combine the chicken, mayonnaise, Dijon mustard, celery, and grapes. • 
Season with salt and pepper. • 
Serve in lettuce leaves.

title: Ingredients:
text:
• 
1 whole wheat tortilla • 
1/2 cup hummus • 
1/2 cup cucumber, sliced • 
1/2 cup bell pepper, sliced • 
1/4 cup shredded carrots • 
1/4 cup baby spinach

title: Instructions:
text:
• 
Lay the tortilla flat and spread the hummus evenly. • 
Add the cucumber, bell pepper, carrots, and spinach. • 
Roll up the tortilla tightly and slice in half.

title: Ingredients:
text:
• 
4 hard-boiled eggs, chopped • 
1/4 cup mayonnaise • 
1 tablespoon Dijon mustard • 
1 celery stalk, diced • 
Salt and pepper to taste • 
2 slices whole grain bread

title: Instructions:
text:
• 
In a bowl, combine the eggs, mayonnaise, Dijon mustard, and celery. • 
Season with salt and pepper. • 
Spread on one slice of bread and top with the second slice.

title: Ingredients:
text:
• 
2 cups cooked pasta (such as rotini or penne) • 
1/2 cup cherry tomatoes, halved • 
1/2 cup cucumber, diced • 
1/4 cup black olives, sliced • 
1/4 cup feta cheese, crumbled • 
2 tablespoons olive oil • 
1 tablespoon red wine vinegar • 
Salt and pepper to taste

title: Instructions:
text:
• 
In a large bowl, combine the pasta, tomatoes, cucumber, olives, and feta cheese. • 
Drizzle with olive oil and red wine vinegar. • 
Season with salt and pepper, then toss to combine. • 
1 cup cooked chicken breast, diced • 
1/2 avocado, diced • 
1/4 cup cherry tomatoes, halved • 
1/4 cup red onion, finely chopped • 
2 tablespoons olive oil • 
1 tablespoon lemon juice • 
Salt and pepper to taste

title: Instructions:
text:
• 
In a bowl, combine the chicken, avocado, tomatoes, and red onion. • 
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice. • 
Season with salt and pepper, then toss to combine.

title: Ingredients:
text:
• 
4 slices turkey breast • 
4 slices cheese (such as cheddar or Swiss) • 
1/2 cup baby spinach • 
1/4 cup hummus

title: Instructions:
text:
• 
Lay a slice of turkey flat and spread with hummus. • 
Place a slice of cheese and a few spinach leaves on top. • 
Roll up tightly and repeat with remaining ingredients.

title: Ingredients:
text:
• 
1 can chickpeas, drained and rinsed • 
1/2 cup cherry tomatoes, halved •
1/2 cucumber, diced • 
1/4 cup red onion, finely chopped • 
1/4 cup feta cheese, crumbled • 
2 tablespoons olive oil • 
1 tablespoon lemon juice • 
Salt and pepper to taste

title: Instructions:
text:
• 
In a large bowl, combine the chickpeas, tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and feta
cheese. • 
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice. • 
Season with salt and pepper, then toss to combine.

title: Ingredients:
text:
• 
1 cup cooked chicken breast, sliced • 
1/2 cup bell pepper, sliced • 
1/2 cup broccoli florets • 
1/4 cup snap peas • 
2 tablespoons soy sauce • 
1 tablespoon olive oil • 
1 teaspoon sesame oil • 
Cooked rice for serving

title: Instructions:
text:
• 
In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. • 
Add bell pepper, broccoli, and snap peas, and stir-fry until tender. • 
Add the cooked chicken and soy sauce, and stir to combine. • 
Drizzle with sesame oil and serve over rice.

title: Ingredients:
text:
• 
1 cup cooked shrimp, peeled and deveined • 
1/2 avocado, diced • 
1/4 cup cherry tomatoes, halved • 
1/4 cup red onion, finely chopped • 
2 tablespoons olive oil • 
1 tablespoon lemon juice • 
Salt and pepper to taste

title: Instructions:
text:
• 
In a bowl, combine the shrimp, avocado, tomatoes, and red onion. • 
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice. • 
Season with salt and pepper, then toss to combine.

title: Ingredients:
text:
• 
1 can black beans, drained and rinsed • 
1 cup corn kernels (fresh or canned) • 
1/2 cup cherry tomatoes, halved • 
1/4 cup red onion, finely chopped • 
1/4 cup cilantro, chopped • 
2 tablespoons olive oil • 
1 tablespoon lime juice • 
Salt and pepper to taste

title: Instructions:
text:
• 
In a large bowl, combine the black beans, corn, tomatoes, red onion, and cilantro. • 
Drizzle with olive oil and lime juice. • 
Season with salt and pepper, then toss to combine.

title: Ingredients:
text:
• 
2 slices whole grain bread • 
1 cup cooked chicken breast, sliced • 
2 tablespoons pesto • 
1/2 cup baby spinach • 
1/4 cup roasted red peppers, sliced

title: Instructions:
text:
• 
Spread pesto on one slice of bread. • 
Layer the chicken, spinach, and roasted red peppers on top. • 
Top with the second slice of bread and cut in half.

title: Ingredients:
text:
• 
1 cup cooked lentils • 
1/2 cup cherry tomatoes, halved • 
1/2 cucumber, diced • 
1/4 cup red onion, finely chopped • 
1/4 cup feta cheese, crumbled • 
2 tablespoons olive oil • 
1 tablespoon red wine vinegar • 
Salt and pepper to taste

title: Instructions:
text:
• 
In a large bowl, combine the lentils, tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and feta cheese. • 
Drizzle with olive oil and red wine vinegar. • 
Season with salt and pepper, then toss to combine.

title: Ingredients:
text:
• 
2 slices whole grain bread • 
1/2 avocado, mashed • 
1/2 cup chickpeas, mashed • 
1/4 cup cherry tomatoes, halved • 
1 tablespoon olive oil • 
Salt and pepper to taste

title: Instructions:
text:
• 
In a bowl, combine the mashed avocado and chickpeas. • 
Spread the mixture on one slice of bread. • 
Top with cherry tomatoes and drizzle with olive oil. • 
Season with salt and pepper, then top with the second slice of bread.

title: Ingredients:
text:
• 
1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved • 
1/2 cucumber, diced • 
1/4 cup red onion, finely chopped • 
1/4 cup black olives, sliced • 
1/4 cup feta cheese, crumbled • 
2 tablespoons olive oil • 
1 tablespoon red wine vinegar • 
Salt and pepper to taste

title: Instructions:
text:
• 
Drizzle with olive oil and red wine vinegar. • 
Season with salt and pepper, then toss to combine.

title:
Turkey and Cranberry Wrap
Ingredients:
text:
• 
1 whole wheat tortilla • 
4 slices turkey breast • 
2 tablespoons cranberry sauce • 
1/2 cup baby spinach • 
1/4 cup shredded carrots • 
Lay the tortilla flat and spread the cranberry sauce evenly. • 
Add the turkey, spinach, and carrots. • 
Roll up the tortilla tightly and slice in half.

title: Ingredients:
text:
• 
1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved • 
1/2 cup fresh mozzarella, diced • 
Fresh basil leaves • 
2 tablespoons olive oil • 
1 tablespoon balsamic glaze • 
Salt and pepper to taste

title: Instructions:
text:
• 
In a bowl, combine the tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil. • 
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze. • 
Season with salt and pepper, then toss to combine.

title: Ingredients:
text:
• 
1 cup cooked chicken breast, cubed • 
1/2 cup bell pepper, cubed • 
1/2 cup zucchini, sliced • 
1/4 cup red onion, cubed • 
2 tablespoons olive oil • 
1 tablespoon lemon juice • 
Salt and pepper to taste

title: Instructions:
text:
• 
Thread the chicken, bell pepper, zucchini, and red onion onto skewers. • 
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice. • 
Season with salt and pepper. • 
Serve cold or reheat before serving.

title: Ingredients:
text:
• 
1 can tuna, drained • 
1/2 avocado, diced • 
1/4 cup cherry tomatoes, halved • 
1/4 cup red onion, finely chopped • 
2 tablespoons olive oil • 
1 tablespoon lemon juice • 
Salt and pepper to taste

title: Instructions:
text:
• 
In a bowl, combine the tuna, avocado, tomatoes, and red onion. • 
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice. • 
Season with salt and pepper, then toss to combine.

title: Ingredients:
text:
• 
1 cup cooked sushi rice • 
1/2 cucumber, julienned • 
1/2 avocado, sliced • 
1/4 cup carrot, julienned • 
2 sheets nori (seaweed) • 
Soy sauce for dipping

title: Instructions:
text:
• 
Lay a sheet of nori on a bamboo sushi mat. • 
Spread a thin layer of sushi rice over the nori, leaving a 1-inch border at the top. • 
Arrange the cucumber, avocado, and carrot in a line along the bottom edge of the rice. • 
Roll the nori tightly using the bamboo mat. • 
Slice into bite-sized pieces and serve with soy sauce.

title: Ingredients:
text:
• 
1 whole wheat pita bread • 
1/2 cup spinach, chopped • 
1/4 cup feta cheese, crumbled • 
1/4 cup cherry tomatoes, halved • 
1 tablespoon olive oil • 
Salt and pepper to taste

title: Instructions:
text:
• 
Cut the pita bread in half to create pockets. • 
In a bowl, combine the spinach, feta cheese, and cherry tomatoes. • 
Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. • 
Stuﬀ the mixture into the pita pockets.

title: Ingredients:
text:
• 
1 whole wheat tortilla • 
1 cup cooked chicken breast, shredded • 
2 tablespoons BBQ sauce • 
1/4 cup shredded cheese • 
1/4 cup coleslaw mix

title: Instructions:
text:
• 
Lay the tortilla flat and spread the BBQ sauce evenly. • 
Add the chicken, cheese, and coleslaw mix. • 
Roll up the tortilla tightly and slice in half.

title: Ingredients:
text:
• 
1 cup cooked couscous • 
1/2 cup cherry tomatoes, halved • 
1/2 cucumber, diced • 
1/4 cup red onion, finely chopped • 
1/4 cup feta cheese, crumbled • 
2 tablespoons olive oil • 
1 tablespoon lemon juice • 
Salt and pepper to taste

title: Instructions:
text:
• 
In a large bowl, combine the couscous, tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and feta
cheese. • 
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice. • 
Season with salt and pepper, then toss to combine.

title: Ingredients:
text:
• 
2 slices whole grain bread • 
1/2 cup roasted eggplant slices • 
1/4 cup hummus • 
1/4 cup baby spinach • 
1/4 cup roasted red peppers, sliced • 
Spread hummus on one slice of bread. • 
Layer the roasted eggplant, spinach, and roasted red peppers on top. • 
Top with the second slice of bread and cut in half.

title: Ingredients:
text:
• 
1 cup cooked chicken breast, diced • 
1/2 mango, diced • 
1/4 cup red onion, finely chopped • 
1/4 cup cilantro, chopped • 
2 tablespoons olive oil • 
1 tablespoon lime juice • 
Salt and pepper to taste

title: Instructions:
text:
• 
In a bowl, combine the chicken, mango, red onion, and cilantro. • 
Drizzle with olive oil and lime juice. • 
Season with salt and pepper, then toss to combine.

title: Ingredients:
text:
• 
1 whole wheat tortilla • 
1/2 cup shredded cheese • 
1/4 cup bell pepper, sliced • 
1/4 cup zucchini, sliced • 
1/4 cup red onion, sliced

title: Instructions:
text:
• 
Lay the tortilla flat and sprinkle half of the cheese on one side. • 
Add the bell pepper, zucchini, and red onion. • 
Sprinkle the remaining cheese on top and fold the tortilla in half. • 
Cook in a skillet over medium heat until the cheese is melted and the tortilla is golden
brown. • 
Slice into wedges.

title: Ingredients:
text:
• 
1 whole wheat tortilla • 
1/2 cup chickpeas, mashed • 
1/4 cup spinach, chopped • 
1/4 cup shredded carrots • 
1 tablespoon tahini • 
1 tablespoon lemon juice • 
Salt and pepper to taste

title: Instructions:
text:
• 
In a bowl, combine the mashed chickpeas, spinach, carrots, tahini, and lemon juice. • 
Season with salt and pepper. • 
Lay the tortilla flat and spread the mixture evenly. • 
Roll up the tortilla tightly and slice in half.

title: Ingredients:
text:
• 
2 slices whole grain bread • 
4 slices turkey breast • 
1/2 apple, thinly sliced • 
1/4 cup baby spinach • 
1 tablespoon mustard or mayo

title: Instructions:
text:
• 
Spread mustard or mayo on one slice of bread. • 
Layer the turkey, apple slices, and spinach on top. • 
Top with the second slice of bread and cut in half.

title:
Mediterranean Tuna Salad
Ingredients:
text:
• 
1 can tuna, drained • 
1/4 cup cherry tomatoes, halved • 
1/4 cup cucumber, diced • 
1/4 cup black olives, sliced • 
1/4 cup feta cheese, crumbled • 
2 tablespoons olive oil • 
1 tablespoon lemon juice • 
Salt and pepper to taste

title: Instructions:
text:
• 
In a bowl, combine the tuna, tomatoes, cucumber, olives, and feta cheese. • 
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice. • 
Season with salt and pepper, then toss to combine.

title: Ingredients:
text:
• 
1 whole wheat tortilla • 
1 cup cooked chicken breast, sliced • 
1/2 avocado, sliced • 
1/4 cup baby spinach • 
1 tablespoon ranch dressing

title: Instructions:
text:
• 
Lay the tortilla flat and spread the ranch dressing evenly. • 
Add the chicken, avocado, and spinach. • 
Roll up the tortilla tightly and slice in half.

title: Lentil and Veggie Wrap
text:
• 
1 whole wheat tortilla • 
1/2 cup cooked lentils • 
1/4 cup bell pepper, sliced • 
1/4 cup cucumber, diced • 
1/4 cup shredded carrots • 
1 tablespoon hummus

title: Instructions:
text:
• 
Lay the tortilla flat and spread the hummus evenly. • 
Add the lentils, bell pepper, cucumber, and carrots. • 
Roll up the tortilla tightly and slice in half.

title: Ingredients:
text:
• 
1 whole wheat tortilla • 
4 slices turkey breast • 
1/4 cup hummus • 
1/4 cup shredded carrots • 
1/4 cup baby spinach

title: Instructions:
text:
• 
Lay the tortilla flat and spread the hummus evenly. • 
Add the turkey, carrots, and spinach. • 
Roll up the tortilla tightly and slice in half.
